body_html: Because of the lack of pthread support on Windows, and the fact that gemmlowp (the quantized math framework we use) relies on it, supporting the graph transform tool isn't possible at the moment on the platform. I don't think it's likely that we'll get a Windows-friendly version of gemmlowp soon, so closing this as infeasible.
